quotes.quote: Tears come from the heart and not from the brain.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Broken people always create the most beautiful pieces of art.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The odds of everything you believe being true is effectively zero.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A person who trust no one now, once trusted someone too much.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The worst feeling in the world is knowing you did your best and it still wasn't good enough.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: You don't realize how lonely you are until it's the end of the day and you have a bunch of things to talk about, but no one to tell them to.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Sometimes, the people with the biggest smiles are the ones struggling the most.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: To hurt is as human as to breathe.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: No matter how much it hurts now, someday you will look back and realize your struggles changed your life for the better.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Never judge people by their past. People learn. People change. People move on.
quotes.author: Tiny Buddha

quotes.quote: I was never asking for too much. I was just asking the wrong person.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: You can't change what has already happened, so don't waste your time thinking about it. Move on, let go, and get over it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: No matter how good you are, people will judge you according to their mood and needs.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: You won't realize the value of something you don't appreciate.
quotes.author: Zyrouge

quotes.quote: The loudest one in the room is the weakest one in the room.
quotes.author: Frank Lucas

quotes.quote: We live in a world in which judgement is more important than getting to know that person.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The loneliest people are the kindest. The saddest people smile the brightest. The most damaged people are the wisest. All because they don't wish to see anyone else suffer the way they did.
quotes.author: Jellal Fernandes
